760180.name: SoundTracks: The Train Set Game
760180.description:
The soundtrack to Tracks: The Train Set Game features 13 beautiful piano pieces. The dulcet tones of this soundtrack rewards your ears and brings your mind back to a much simpler time... When you used to play with small wooden trains and track pieces.

Track Listing

  • Apartment Theme 01
  • Apartment Theme 02
  • Apartment Theme 03
  • Apartment Theme 04
  • Bedroom 01
  • Bedroom 02
  • Bedroom 03
  • Bedroom 04
  • Bedroom 05
  • Casual Ride
  • Christmas
  • Christmas Trailer
  • Commute
  • Distant Childhood
  • Honeymoon
  • Night Theme 01
  • Night Theme 02
  • Night Theme 03
  • Peaceful Building Mood
  • Winter 01
  • Winter 02
  • Winter 03

    Credits

    Kevin Gallagher
